featured.text: Performers usually play on a tall stage with lanterns and banners strung all around.

definition.zh_def: 用於宣傳或裝飾的長條布或紙，上面通常印有文字或圖案。
definition.en_def: A long strip of cloth or paper bearing a slogan or design, often used for advertising or decoration.
definition.example: The company hung a large banner outside the store to promote their grand opening.
